title: Steam Wallet Code (VND)
notes: Steam Wallet Code (VND) do SEAGM phat hanh la ma ky thuat so.
Ma co the dung de nap vao vi Steam va chi ap dung cho PC/Steam.
Khong chia se ma qua email, mang xa hoi hoac dien thoai.

description.title: Giới thiệu về Steam Wallet Code (VND)
body: Steam Wallet Code (VND) la ma ky thuat so dung de nap vao Steam Wallet. Ma ap dung theo khu vuc/tien te cua tai khoan Steam.
Ma chi danh cho PC/Steam va khong hoan lai.

description.title: STEAM la gi?
body: STEAM la nen tang phan phoi game PC pho bien, cho phep ban mua, tai va choi cac tua game yeu thich.
Ngoai game, ban co the nap vao vi de mua item, game pass, va nhieu tien ich khac.

description.title: Cach quy doi Steam Wallet Code?
body: Dang nhap vao tai khoan Steam cua ban.
Truy cap muc Games > Redeem a Steam Wallet Code.
Nhap ma Steam Wallet Code nhan duoc tai SEAGM.
Kiem tra so du cap nhat trong vi va san sang mua sam.
